key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including fines for anti-competitive practices and unresolved tax disputes
High competitive pressures in the online travel agency market
Economic sensitivity to downturns, geopolitical events, and health crises
Dependence on third-party partnerships for operations
Customer service issues affecting reputation and retention
controversies: Fined by the Competition Commission of India for anti-competitive practices
Legal challenges related to income tax adjustments
environmental_issues: Promoting eco-friendly travel options and sustainable tourism practices
social_issues: Customer complaints regarding booking errors, refund delays, and support issues
governance_issues: Regulatory fines and legal disputes indicating potential governance challenges

sources.title: MakeMyTrip Ltd. Company Profile | StatInvestor
sources.snippet: MakeMyTrip Ltd. is an online travel company, which engages in the ownership and operation of online brands, including MakeMyTrip, goibibo, and redbus.
